se.dat255.bulletinferno.model.map
Interface MapEnvironment

MapEnvironmentImpl
public interface MapEnvironment

Environment for keeping track of anything map-related.

Method Detail

getSegments

java.util.List<? extends Segment> getSegments()
Note: setViewport must be called before this method is called.

Returns:
a list of all active segments (to some extent in, or at least near, the viewport).

getRemovedSegmentCount

int getRemovedSegmentCount()
Returns:
the number of segments that have been removed from the active segment list since the SegmentManager started. Removals only happen from the beginning of the segment list.

setViewport

void setViewport(com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 viewportPosition,
                 com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 viewportDimensions)
Sets the viewport. Segments will be inside (completely or to some extent, or at least near).

Parameters:
viewportPosition - the center-position in world coordinates for the viewport.
viewportDimensions - the dimensions of the viewport in world coordinates (width, height).

getEntityEnvironment

EntityEnvironment getEntityEnvironment()

getProjectiles

java.util.List<? extends Projectile> getProjectiles()
Returns a list of all projectiles in the game

Returns:
a list of projectiles currently in the game.

getWeaponEnvironment

WeaponEnvironment getWeaponEnvironment()
Returns:
the games weapon environment. Only for use by controllers!
